GLO-2.name: solara
GLO-2.video-writting: Solar-powered, wireless Bluetooth speaker for indoors and outdoors. 360-degree LED light, 360-degree sound, solar-charging panel, and EZ-Play technology.

features.solar-panel: The Solara’s built-in solar panel charges the speaker’s battery, boosting battery life and audio performance outdoors. More time in the sun means less time plugged into a socket.

GLO-2.monster-zone-description-1: The Monster Zone app puts full command of our Monster EZ-Play speakers in the palm of your hand. The Monster EZ-Play wireless bluetooth speakers are loaded with several features that make them great for indoors and outdoors.
GLO-2.monster-zone-description-2: The Monster Zone app is strictly compatible with the Monster GLO and Monster Solara.
